_header: Let reason rule thee that this book shall read

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Let reason Rule the þat this booke shall reedeWithe good matter
                    shalt thow finde in deedeThowghe some be ill doo not the rest
                    dispizeConsider of the tyme else thow art not wize
CamMagPep2498.Note:
Added by a later hand to originally blank page, sixteenth-century
                    hand.
CamMagPep2498.Editions:
Påhlsson,  Joel,
                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
         Lund: Ohlsson, 1911: x.
